project_summary: A scalable, secure e-commerce platform with comprehensive product management and user experience features, built for high performance and reliability.

milestones.name: Project Setup & Core Architecture
milestones.description: Establish project infrastructure, database design, and foundational backend services

tasks.name: Tech Stack Configuration
tasks.description: Set up Node.js/Express backend, PostgreSQL database, Redis session management

tasks.name: Database Schema Design
tasks.description: Create comprehensive database schema for users, products, orders, and inventory

tasks.name: Authentication Framework
tasks.description: Implement user registration, login, and two-factor authentication system

milestones.name: Product Management & Catalog
milestones.description: Develop product listing, search, and management functionalities

tasks.name: Product CRUD Operations
tasks.description: Create backend APIs for product creation, retrieval, update, and deletion

tasks.name: Search and Filtering
tasks.description: Implement advanced product search with category and attribute filtering

tasks.name: Image Management
tasks.description: Set up AWS S3 integration, implement image upload and optimization

milestones.name: User Experience & Shopping Flow
milestones.description: Develop frontend React components and shopping cart functionality

tasks.name: React Component Development
tasks.description: Create responsive UI components for product listing, details, and cart

tasks.name: Shopping Cart Implementation
tasks.description: Develop cart functionality with add/remove items and price calculation

tasks.name: Checkout Process
tasks.description: Integrate Stripe payment processing and order confirmation workflow

milestones.name: Performance & Security Optimization
milestones.description: Implement caching, CDN integration, and comprehensive security measures

tasks.name: CDN and Caching Setup
tasks.description: Configure Redis caching and CDN for global performance optimization

tasks.name: Security Hardening
tasks.description: Implement rate limiting, SQL injection, XSS, and CSRF protections

tasks.name: Analytics Integration
tasks.description: Set up Google Analytics and custom performance monitoring

milestones.name: Testing, Deployment & Launch
milestones.description: Comprehensive testing, staging deployment, and final production launch

tasks.name: Comprehensive Testing
tasks.description: Perform unit, integration, and load testing across all system components

tasks.name: Staging Deployment
tasks.description: Deploy to staging environment and conduct final user acceptance testing

tasks.name: Production Launch
tasks.description: Final production deployment with monitoring and rollback strategies
